items.content_html: Members night at the Nashville Zoo. The animals are way more active in the evening.
üìö Just finished ‚ÄúThe Caledonian Gambit‚Äù by Dan Moren. Super fun sci-fi read. I definitely recommend it.
The more I use Shortcuts, the more I want them to be able to access NSUserActivity so I can say ‚ÄúRun my playlist doubler shortcuts on this playlist.‚Äù
Yep. Faster internet is the key.

Took a long weekend at the beach to celebrate this one‚Äôs 30th birthday. Thankful for some kid free relaxation time. Now to start getting ready for the school year to start. It‚Äôs only a few weeks away.
Just tried using my Workflow to upload an episode of @theclassnerd. It seems like that workflow doesn‚Äôt like 25 MB files. I‚Äôm going to try again on a better Internet connection.
Just noticed this in the list of apps with integrations inside Shortcuts. Tapping on it currently does nothing, but I‚Äôm excited to see what shows up.

A week and a half on the iOS Public Beta, countless bugs experienced, bugs reported: 0

13 hours on the Shortcuts beta, 2 bugs experienced, bugs reported: 2.

Clearly I have priorities.
I‚Äôm wondering if I got on the Shortcuts beta because I was on the old Workflow beta before Apple acquired them. It wasn‚Äôt through TestFlight, but I bet they still have that list.
üò± I genuinely don‚Äôt know how this happened. No developer account. I didn‚Äôt request access. I just got an email. But I am certainly not complaining. Thanks Apple!

items.title: Micro.blog Image and Podcast Posting with Workflow and Drafts
items.content_html:
While I use this site primarily for microposts, I host my blog and podcast, @theclassnerd, here on Micro.blog as well. There I post longer form content that includes multiple images which has never been easy with Micro.blog hosted sites, especially as an iOS only user.

I‚Äôve finally put together something I‚Äôve wanted to do for a long time, a combination of Drafts actions and workflows to upload images and mp3s to Micro.blog using the micropub API. The Drafts actions then insert the markdown for the image or html for the audio into my Draft right where the cursor is.

I‚Äôve been posting everything I possibly can from Drafts since the Drafts 5 beta launched. Now, I really can do all of my posting there.

Special thanks to @manton for adapting Micro.blog‚Äôs implementation of the micropub API so that the URLs don‚Äôt just come back through the response header (which Workflow can‚Äôt see), but also in JSON so I can extract it.

You can get all of my actions and workflows here:

  • Image Drafts Action
  • Image Workflow
  • Podcast Drafts Action
  • Podcast Workflow

Note: To run the workflows, you will need an app token from your Micro.blog account.
Public Beta 2 is live!

I don‚Äôt know if this was my July challenge because of an iOS 12 bug or because I normally use Workouts++ instead of the standard workouts app to track my workouts. Either way, it was the easiest monthly challenge I‚Äôve ever had.

Alright Micro.blog community, I‚Äôm wanting to write a workflow (or probably a Shortcut by the time I‚Äôm finished with it) to be able to post podcast episodes and images to micro.blog using the micropub API. I‚Äôm no programmer, but I can write a Drafts script and understand REST APIs. When I look at the micropub documentation on how to structure a multi-part/form request to the media endpoint, I may as well be reading another language. Has anyone successfully uploaded files to micro.blog using Workflow? Or is there a more user-friendly place to start with multi-part/form requests?

üéµ GIRL TALK - ALL DAY

3 years later, this is still my favorite record to have playing while I work thanks to @imyke and @settern‚Äôs introduction.

I understand why people complain about iOS‚Äôs model of only being able to buy software from the App Store, but having spent far too long trying to get software downloaded from the web to work on my wife‚Äôs Mac today, I have to say, I prefer the App Store model.
üì∫ Just finished Lost in Space Season 1. Holy cow. If you love Sci-fi, you have to watch this ASAP.
I spent most of today in bed sick, but did manage to rewatch Rogue One. Though not a perfect movie, it‚Äôs definitely a good one. I really hope the Star Wars Story movies continue.
Yesterday I finally got to play guitar in the studio again for the first time in years. Such a good feeling.

I won‚Äôt repost every episode of @theclassnerd podcast here, but it‚Äôs new and I‚Äôm excited. Episode 2 is live!

  • Apple Podcasts
  • Overcast
  • Web
üìΩ Just saw ‚ÄúWon‚Äôt You Be My Neighbor?‚Äù, and I am genuinely at a loss for words on how good it was. Go see it immediately.
Happy 30th birthday to the most compassionate, patient, funniest, and prettiest woman I know. Everyone who knows you loves you. I‚Äôm glad you were born and that we get to spend our days together.
I make great decisions with my only iPhone.

üéµ Ben Rector - Magic

This record is üî•

John Mayer - Making of ‚ÄúNew Light‚Äù for IGTV

This does not help the part of me that misses making music.
